thread.section_title: La Quinta Inn & Suites Manhattan - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: In manhattan center
thread.title_full: In manhattan center - Review of La Quinta Inn & Suites Manhattan, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: LoboDias
title: In manhattan center
text: The hotel is very well placed in Manhattan. You have a subway station at 50 Meters. The hotel is simple, people that work there are friendly. The rooms are ok. The a/c makes a bit of noise. Breakfast is not bad but not the best. Could have some fried eggs and other variety of fruits. Overall, compared to other Manhattan hotels the price is good. And with the excellent location this is a very good choice.
